tasks.label: CMake: build and run all examples/tests
tasks.command: mkdir -Force build; cd build; cmake ..; cmake --build .; if (Test-Path .\examples\basic_usage.exe) { .\examples\basic_usage.exe } if (Test-Path .\examples\basic_training.exe) { .\examples\basic_training.exe } if (Test-Path .\examples\polymorphic_usage.exe) { .\examples\polymorphic_usage.exe } if (Test-Path .\tests\test_tensor.exe) { .\tests\test_tensor.exe } if (Test-Path .\tests\test_relu.exe) { .\tests\test_relu.exe }
